game.name: Super Fairy Powers
game.description:
Hey girls! We have tried to get you covered with a brand new girls game where you would meet with the cutest fairy on this planet! Are you ready, friends? Join Super Fairy Powers and be prepared to spend some quality time with your favorite character! Your favorite super fairy Ladybug has got into the big trouble. Now it is up to her to save the people of her country. She needs your help in playing the fidget spinner and getting her playing power back.

There are two rounds to complete in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls. In the first round, you have to prepare a fidget spinner for the girl, while you have to help her to pick up the nice outfit in the second stage. Remember she will get her flying power back only if you she is able to score a significant number of points. Choose a design for the spinner and then give it a lovely matching color and design! Once it is done, make sure to dress up your girl with the cool outfit.

Give her a fabulous hairstyle and dress her up with a strapless green top with a yellow design at the bottom and black paint with star prints! Combine her look with a pair of yellow long boots, a pair of green butterfly-style wings! You also have various other dressing options to play through. Do not forget to rotate the spinner in the end and learn if you have scored enough points to fly. Good luck to get the necessary points to help the Disney superhero girl to be a real fairy! Play more popular titles online and have fun without download!
